decks.notes: The key strategy of this Gruul Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and burn spells. By utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Fireblade Charger, along with pump spells like Titan's Strength and Audacity, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. Thud and Monstrous Rage provide additional ways to finish off the opponent, while cards like Mirran Banesplitter and Kumano Faces Kakkazan help maintain board presence. The mana base of lands like Stomping Ground and Karplusan Forest ensures the deck can cast its spells on curve and maintain a steady aggression.
